subject: Order SSN4583 request
description_text:
Hi Simsonn team,

I just purchased an order SSN4583 but there is 1 item which will be available only at 15. december.

Can you please send me rest of the order now so we can catch it until 24. december ? (Christmas present).

I think you should be ok with shipping fee as the order is more than 2 x 399 USD

Also please send me commercial invoice for this company:

Company name: Kazuki s.r.o.
Company address: Pupavova 4161, 95117 Cabaj-Capor, Slovakia
VAT ID: SK2122103214

Thank you very much for understanding.

Best regards,

Frantisek Balazsy

conversations.body_text: Hi Frank Balazsy,    Alright, we'll ship the other products to you as soon as possible.

Thank you very much !

Just please don't forget that commercial invoice for company described
above as I will be doing customs on it.

Best regards,

Frank

DÅˆa st 10. 12. 2025, 8:25 support@simsonn.com

If you think it won't arrive on time we can use express shipping just sent me instructions I will pay to you through PayPal.

Thank you for understanding and your help.

>

Hi guys please if possible I would like to pay more for express shipping I am really worried it won't arrive until 24.12.

Please let me know and save me. 

Love you. 

Best regards,

Frank 

>
Hi Frank Balazsy,    Do not worry, we shall dispatch your order as soon as possible.
